name: Dice Defence (surftijmen, Bruhyan)
description:
Description: 

A tower defence game where you get random towers based on dice rolls!

At the beginning of  each round, roll dice to get 1 random tower and 2 powerups to add to your game. Use these to the best of your abilities to defeat the pawns marching towards the end of the track!

As an additional challenge, try to beat the game without losing a life!

Towers:

Roulette Wheel:

A roulette wheel that shoots out small balls in all directions, dealing high damage in a short range.

Chip Thrower:

A D4 dice that jumps up and down, throwing out a poker chip in the direction of the enemies that deals moderate damage to anything it hits.

Sniper Tower:

A sniper tower that shoots lasers at the enemies, dealing an  incredible amount of damage to one enemy - at the cost of speed.

Upgrades:

Speed/Damage/Range:

Gives the selected tower a permanent upgrade of the respective stat. Note that these disappear when deconstructing the tower.

Frenzy: 

Gives the selected tower a temporary speed  boost.

Enemies:

White Pawn:

The standard enemy. Has a healthy balance of health and speed.

Red Pawn:

A fast enemy, travels at a great speed but with reduced health.

Blue Pawn:

A slow enemy, travels slower but has more health to make up for it.

Pink Pawn:

The pawn equivalent of a tank, travels at very slow speeds but compensates with it's ability to absorb damage like a sponge.
